title: Document AI - Method: processorVersions.evaluateProcessorVersion
abstract:
# Document AI - Method: processorVersions.evaluateProcessorVersion
**Full name** : projects.locations.processors.processorVersions.evaluateProcessorVersion
Evaluates a ProcessorVersion against annotated documents, producing an Evaluation.
#
content:
## HTTP request`POST https://{endpoint}/v1beta3/{processorVersion}:evaluateProcessorVersion`
Where `{endpoint}` is one of the [supported service endpoints](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest#rest_endpoints) .
### Path parameters| Parameters  | Parameters.1                                                                                                      |
|:-----------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| processorVersion | string Required. The resource name of the ProcessorVersion to evaluate. projects/{project}/locations/{location}/processors/{processor}/processorVersions/{processorVersion} It takes the form projects/{project}/locations/{location}/processors/{processor}/processorVersions/{processorversion}. Authorization requires the following IAM permission on the specified resource processorVersion: documentai.evaluations.create |
### Request bodyThe request body contains data with the following structure:
| JSON representation             |
|:---------------------------------------------------------------------|
| { "evaluationDocuments": { object (BatchDocumentsInputConfig) } } || Fields    | Fields.1                                   |
|:--------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| evaluationDocuments | object (BatchDocumentsInputConfig) Optional. The documents used in the evaluation. If unspecified, use the processor's dataset as evaluation input. |
### Response bodyIf successful, the response body contains an instance of ` [Operation](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/Shared.Types/ListOperationsResponse#Operation) ` .
### Authorization scopesRequires the following OAuth scope:- `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform`For more information, see the [Authentication Overview](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/) .
### IAM PermissionsRequires the following [IAM](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs) permission on the `processorVersion` resource:- `documentai.evaluations.create`For more information, see the [IAM documentation](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs) .
